description:
This presentation was recorded at GOTO Copenhagen 2016
http://gotocph.com

Michiel Fokke - CTO at Quby
Freek van Gool - Platform Architect at Quby

ABSTRACT
This presentation is about how a Quby created a smart thermostat and was blown away by its success. This is the story of all the stumbling blocks[...]

title: Scaling IoT
